definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Never to master one's anger is a mark of intemperance and lack of training.
sentences.chinese: 不能克制怒气是任性和缺乏教养的标志。

sentences.english: For extreme diseases, extreme methods of cure, as to restriction, are most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 对于重病，就克制治疗而言，最宜采取极端之疗法。

sentences.english: He could not restrain himself from shouting aloud.
sentences.chinese: 他克制不住自己要大声喊叫。

sentences.english: Young men and women must quench their desire to marry early in life.
sentences.chinese: 青年男女一定要克制早婚的欲望。

sentences.english: I could not control and make self-repression on such rational basic.
sentences.chinese: 我做不到这么理性的克制和压抑自我。

sentences.english: A bioassay test was conducted to examine the allelopathic effect of the sterilized seedlings on Chlamydomonas reinhardtii.
sentences.chinese: 用生物检测法测试无菌苗对衣藻的克制效应。

sentences.english: The old-fashioned idea is that women withhold sex when they want power.
sentences.chinese: 老式的想法是当女人想要权力的时候会克制性。

sentences.english: I will keep my ill-humour to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我会克制住我的坏脾气的。

sentences.english: She looked at me, eyes steely from trying not to cry.
sentences.chinese: 她看着我，眼睛克制住不让眼泪流出来。

sentences.english: Love is the irresistible desire to be desired irresistibly.
sentences.chinese: 爱是一种难以克制的欲望，控制不住的渴望着。

sentences.english: So the strong will prevailed, subduing and moulding the gentler.
sentences.chinese: 于是强大的一方获胜，温和的一方克制退让。

sentences.english: I couldn't constrain my excitement any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我再也克制不住激动的心情。

sentences.english: We will seek the Chinese side's self-restraint from taking such dangerous action.
sentences.chinese: 我们将寻求中方克制，勿采取如此危险的行动。

sentences.english: He forbears to mention the matter again.
sentences.chinese: 他克制自己，不再提及此事。

definition: to endure/to bear with/to exercise patience/to restrain oneself/patience/endurance
to resist/to hold back/to stop/to ward off/to withstand
to have an urge/to be impetuous/impulse/urge
to dwindle/to vanish/to make vanish/to exercise restraint/to curb (one's mirth, arrogance etc)/to astringe/(math.) to converge
to cover up/to conceal/to mask/to gloss over
to take countermeasures against/to hit back/to counter
to dissolve/to resolve (contradictions)/to dispel (doubts)/to iron out (difficulties)/to defuse (conflicts)/to neutralize (fears)
